name: joystick-web-app
description: Web-based joystick/gamepad input application using Emscripten and Node.js with graphical controller visualization

scripts.build-wasm: emcc joystick_web.cpp -o build/joystick.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_ListGamepads','_StartStreaming','_StopStreaming','_UpdateGamepadState','_IsStreaming','_GetSelectedGamepad']" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['ccall','cwrap']" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s USE_SDL=0 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=0 -O2 --bind
scripts.build-wasm-debug: emcc joystick_web.cpp -o build/joystick.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS="['_ListGamepads','_StartStreaming','_StopStreaming','_UpdateGamepadState','_IsStreaming','_GetSelectedGamepad']" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS="['ccall','cwrap']" -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s USE_SDL=0 -s DISABLE_EXCEPTION_CATCHING=0 -s ASSERTIONS=1 -O0 -g --bind
scripts.copy-wasm: cp build/joystick.js public/ && cp build/joystick.wasm public/
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-wasm-debug && npm run copy-wasm
scripts.setup: npm install && mkdir -p build public && npm run build
